name: fireballgame
0:
”Alexa open fireball game”
”I choose fireball”
”I choose charge”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fireball game
des: There are three choices, fireball, charge and shield. Fireball costs one charge but shield costs none. Fireball beats charge but shield deflects fireball. You can only do shield 5 times, or else it will be unfair.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
